config.debug.name: Debug Mode
config.debug.tooltip: Shows current energy stats above player head.
config.adaptive.name: Adaptive Mode
config.adaptive.tooltip: If true, uses the schedule below. If false, uses constant settings.
config.frequency.name: Regen Frequency (Sec)
config.frequency.tooltip: How many seconds to wait between stamina regeneration ticks. (Default: 5)
config.regen.name: Flat Regen (+)
config.regen.tooltip: How much stamina to restore per tick.
config.drain.name: Drain Reduction (%)
config.drain.tooltip: What percentage of tool energy cost to ignore (0 = normal cost, 100 = free tools).
config.adaptive.note: Set Regen and Drain for each time slot.
